body_html:
The last comment on that Travis issue is over a year old... I guess that means they want you to move to docker for real. You're of course welcome to use our CI docker images.

As @gunan noted, we cannot stay with old Ubuntu since CUDA won't let us.

body:
The last comment on that Travis issue is over a year old... I guess that means they want you to move to docker for real. You're of course welcome to use our CI docker images. 

As @gunan noted, we cannot stay with old Ubuntu since CUDA won't let us.
